props.alwaysDirty: When used with the **thumb-label** prop will always show the thumb label.
props.inverseLabel: Reverse the label position. Works with **rtl**.
props.step: If greater than 0, sets step interval for ticks
props.thumbColor: Sets the thumb and thumb label color
props.thumbLabel: Show thumb label. If `true` it shows label when using slider. If set to `'always'` it always shows label.
props.thumbSize: Controls the size of the thumb label.
props.ticks: Show track ticks. If `true` it shows ticks when using slider. If set to `'always'` it always shows ticks.
props.tickLabels: When provided with Array<string>, will attempt to map the labels to each step in index order

slots.thumb-label: Replaces the content inside the thumb label

events.end: Slider value emitted at the end of slider movement
events.start: Slider value emitted at start of slider movement
